short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily inspiration in your browser new tab & Customize background from selective Nature image gallery

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a free add-on for Chrome Browser where the primary target is inspiring you to be more productive. Also, set a background from our selective Inspirational image gallery powered by Unsplash in your Chrome Browser default new tab. We are actually changing your Chrome browser default new tab page. Also as added features, Get inspired with a daily quote, Get inspired with a custom background for your new tab powered by Unsplash, Search your desired information, image, video and others through Bing search. There is also a Digital Clock in new tabs where you can check your current location time in 12 hour / 24-hour format according to your preference.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to install the "Inspiration needed" and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to that provided by the service with web search by Bing, and the Privacy Policy (https://quexleeltd.com/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://quexleeltd.com/terms-conditions/).
